collection_holder_name: Woodson Research Center Special Collections & Archives, Fondren Library
pageContext.collection_description: The KTRU Rice Radio archive includes audio created by the student radio station from 1969 - 2005, covering a variety of searchable topics, such as: news, sports, interviews, musician interviews, and speeches and lectures. To learn more about the Rice University KTRU Radio records and their complete contents, please visit our detailed inventory.
collectionFormats: Digital audio file (including MP3, WAV, AIFF, etc.)
pageContext.collection_usage_statement: This material is open for research.
